item.title: Agentic AI: The Future of Autonomous Intelligence
item.description:
The future of artificial intelligence is not just about large language models ‚Äî it’s about autonomous agents that can think, reason, and act on our behalf.

Welcome to the world of Agentic AI.

üöÄ What is Agentic AI?

Agentic AI refers to AI systems that exhibit autonomous behavior, capable of planning, reasoning, and interacting with other agents or tools to accomplish complex tasks ‚Äî all with minimal human input.

Unlike traditional machine learning pipelines or even prompt-based LLMs, agentic systems:
